entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 40 percent chance of flurries later this evening. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming north 20 gusting to 40 late this evening then light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Saturday 1 April 2023
